function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contaminated air exhaust outlets leading to deposition of virus-laden droplets on equipment such as vents","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through contaminated equipment","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of air exhaust outlets and equipment","Technologies":"Air purifiers and UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Healthcare workers, facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Operational limitations during an outbreak leading to inconsistent methodology and small sample size","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the risk of transmission and contamination","Mitigation":"Standardize methods for sample collection and increase sample size","Technologies":"Automated sample collection systems","People":"Health researchers, laboratory staff","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited air sampling volume and dilution of airborne SARS-CoV-2 in the room","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of airborne virus presence","Mitigation":"Increase the volume of air sampled and consider the effect of air exchanges in the room","Technologies":"High-volume air samplers, real-time air quality monitors","People":"Environmental health experts, facility management","Owner":"Environmental health organizations, facility management teams"}]}
